      public boolean debugRender
      Debug flag. Handled internally for components.Programmers who choose to directly extend from DoaComponent, must handle this properly.

  • Method Details

    • init

      @ForOverride protected void init()
      De-facto constructor of DoaComponent. Programmers should override this method instead of creating a constructor. This method is called by the contructor of DoaComponent upon instantiation.

    • onAdd

      @ForOverride protected void onAdd​(DoaObject o)
      Called when this DoaComponent is successfully added to a DoaObject.
      Parameters:
      o - the DoaObject this DoaComponent added to

    • onRemove

      @ForOverride protected void onRemove​(DoaObject o)
      Called when this DoaComponent is successfully removed from a DoaObject.
      Parameters:
      o - the DoaObject this DoaComponent is removed from

    • isEnabled

      public boolean isEnabled()
      Enabled components participate in logic/rendering. This is handled internally for pre-made scripts/renderers. Programmers who choose to directly extend from DoaComponent, must handle this properly.
      Returns:
      true if component is enabled

    • enable

      public void enable()
      Enables this DoaComponent.

    • disable

      public void disable()
      Disables this DoaComponent.

    • getOwner

      public DoaObject getOwner()
      Returns:
      the DoaObject this DoaComponent is added to.
